Creates or updates the README.md file in the repository with relevant information about the project, including installation instructions, usage examples, and contribution guidelines.

## Workflow 
1. Look at the project structure and understand its content
2. Find all prompt files
3. Understand the purpouse of all prompt files

## Outcome
Update readme file with the following sections:
1. Current project struct
2. List of all prompt files
3. Sum up the description of the purpouse of each prompt file
